post.body: lol thats just me
baby girl its Ssgt.Isley...lol but i love you still...brandon wants a skate board cake..when you want to go to walmart
what do you feel weird about????
thank you the boys are leaven sat morning..i just need a min to myself,but i will likely come by ur house at some point.love u 2
omg these kids......are driven me crazy
okay im a little pissed off me nor my kids have played our Wii sence we moved here n try to play it 2day,THE FUCKER WANT WORK..YEAH IM MAD
getting ready to put the kids down..bring the dog in and watch some tv...cant wait till tom..when i can talk to my man again i love you josh
GOING TO GET MY KIDS,COME HOME AND DO THE MOMMY THING...I LOVE YOU JOSH
im going to kill the dog....not happy right now.....going to find some food to eat
well im off to bed got to get up at 6am to get my kids to school...I LOVE YOU JOHSUA C. ISLEY
SO BORED AND SICK OF CLEANING.... SOMETIMES I HATE BEING THE TYPE THAT HAS TO BE SO CLEAN....GOT TO GET THE KIDS AND THE DOG TODAY AT 6
i love you josh!!!!!!!!1 now and for the rest of my life!!!!!!!!!!!!!
damn here i am eatting again...i been eatting and watchin tv all day i should be bigs as a house....but nope..the lbs want stay..and i try
im home bored out of my mind...i feel like i dont know ...just out of it...i wish i was out of it ....but im just not me...i need my man....
NOT LOVING THINGS RIGHT NOW...IM NOT FUCKIN HAPPY!!!!!!!!!!
im still home watching lifetime...talked to my husband,i miss him so much i cant stand this....i love you josh
home missing him so much,,watching lifetime,need to get up and go uptown...maybe i will soon..i love you josh
IM SO GLAD TO BE BACK IN SC...I STILL MISS HIM SO MUCH..I LOVE YOU JOSH
OH MY GOD...I will NEVER take kids by myself to VA AGAIN...the trip was not fun and it hurt more to be there then to just stay home
I wonder if he closes his eyes and thanks hard enough if he can feel my touch,as i do when i do the same thing!!! I LOVE YOU JOSHUA
